INVENTORY.name: Silk Armor
INVENTORY.description: An exquisite piece of incredibly light armor.

INVENTORY.name: Stick and String
INVENTORY.description: A length of twine wrapped around an old stick with a nail as a hook. It's a little unreliable.

INVENTORY.name: Common Snook
INVENTORY.description: A drab yellow fish with a single black stripe along its sides.

INVENTORY.name: Hake
INVENTORY.description: A drab fish with long fins along its back and stomach, that give it an almost eel-like appearance.

INVENTORY.name: Sardine
INVENTORY.description: A miniscule silvery blue fish that travels in large schools.

INVENTORY.name: Squid
INVENTORY.description: A small tentacled creature, with a long head and a curious look in its black eyes.

INVENTORY.name: Flying Fish
INVENTORY.description: A small fish with colorful wings, known to hop out of the water and glide.

INVENTORY.name: Gar
INVENTORY.description: A large slender fish with vibrant splotches and a long, toothy snout.

INVENTORY.name: Grindle
INVENTORY.description: A green sharp-toothed fish fringed in long spotted fins.

INVENTORY.name: Salmon
INVENTORY.description: A long, bright red fish with a green head; prized for the taste of its flesh.

fish.name: Salmon
fish.description: A long, bright red fish with a green head; prized for the taste of its flesh.

INVENTORY.name: Elemental Spellbook
INVENTORY.description: Used to learn strong elemental spells.

INVENTORY.name: Scepter
INVENTORY.description: Used to cast spells. Adds +1 Damage to your spells. Spells have a 10% Chance to not use AP.

INVENTORY.name: Silk Armor
INVENTORY.description: An exquisite piece of incredibly light armor.

SPELLS.name: Wall of Fire
SPELLS.description: Deal 3-6 damage to every enemy in a selected row.

SPELLS.name: Earthen Spear
SPELLS.description: Deal 8-12 damage to an adjacent target.

SPELLS.name: Blizzard
SPELLS.description: Deal 2-4 damage to all enemies. Has a small chance to stun them.

SPELLS.name: Entangle
SPELLS.description: Summon vines to a row, dealing 2-4 damage and having a chance to root enemies in place.

SPELLS.name: Freeze
SPELLS.description: Deal 2-6 damage to a target and freeze them, stunning them for a turn.

SPELLS.name: Chain Lightning
SPELLS.description: Deal 2-6 damage per target to 3 targets.

runes.name: Maladious
runes.description: If a target is debuffed, gain +2 Damage, +1 Damage per Debuff.

INVENTORY.name: Leather Cuirass
INVENTORY.description: A plain leather cuirass, well-worn and scuffed.

INVENTORY.name: Elemental Spellbook
INVENTORY.description: Used to learn strong elemental spells.

SPELLS.name: Entangle
SPELLS.description: Summon vines to a row, dealing 2-4 damage and having a chance to root enemies in place.

SPELLS.name: Stoneskin
SPELLS.description: +8 Physical Armor +4 Magical Armor for 3 turns.

SPELLS.name: Chain Lightning
SPELLS.description: Deal 2-6 damage per target to 3 targets.

SPELLS.name: Blizzard
SPELLS.description: Deal 2-4 damage to all enemies. Has a small chance to stun them.

SPELLS.name: Gale
SPELLS.description: Push a row of enemies back one row.

SPELLS.name: Earthen Spear
SPELLS.description: Deal 8-12 damage to an adjacent target.
